action: I want to securely and centrally manage contracts with business partners
reason: Because I need to prevent legal risks caused by missed checks on contract details or expirations
acceptance_criteria: The system shall allow only authenticated users to access the contract registration function.
The system must restrict registration, update, and deletion privileges to users with the 'Contract Management' role.
The system must automatically generate a globally unique Contract ID for each new record.
The system shall require the Contract Title and a valid Business Partner ID as mandatory fields.
The system must validate that the Contract Type is selected from a predefined list (e.g., Service Agreement, NDA, Sales Contract).
The system shall validate that the Start Date and End Date are valid and that the End Date is not earlier than the Start Date.
The system must support the uploading of contract documents (PDF/Word) while strictly enforcing an extension allowlist.
The system shall execute a virus scan on all uploaded files before storing them in an encrypted storage container.
The system must control file access exclusively via time-limited signed URLs.
The system shall store all text metadata in UTF-8 encoding and use parameterized queries to prevent SQL injection.
The system must sanitize all input values to protect against Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.
The system shall automatically increment the version number upon updates and retain the history of previous versions.
The system must implement logical deletion for contracts, restricted to 'Administrator' roles, and generate an audit log.
The system shall record an access log for every document view, capturing User ID, Timestamp, and IP address.
The system must automatically generate an alert notification 30 days prior to the contract expiration date via an asynchronous queue.
The system shall automatically update the contract status to 'Expired' upon the termination date.
The system must enforce strict status transitions, allowing only valid states such as 'Active', 'Expired', or 'Terminated'.
The system shall support full-text search for contracts, filtering results based on the user's access permissions.
The system must enforce rate limiting and HTTPS (TLS 1.2+) for all API interactions.
The system shall execute registration and updates within a single database transaction, using optimistic locking for concurrency control.
The system must maintain a change history log, recording values before and after modifications.
The system shall store audit logs in tamper-evident storage to prevent modification.
The system must execute periodic encrypted backups of contract data.
The system shall enforce permission checks and apply data masking rules during CSV or PDF export operations.
The API must adhere to REST principles, support versioning, and must not expose internal error details.
